column3: Latest;Siem Reap: A Frenchman died of a heart attack in his hotel room
column4: according to a report from Siem Reap.------The incident took place at around 08:00 on December 9
column5: 2019 at Room 203 of the (Moha?) Boutique in Svay Dangkum  Siem Reap.------According to local authorities
column9: was a French tourist. The body has now been taken to the Wat Teuk Thla Temple in Phnom Penh
